original_title: Pastor Jerome says will return on Sunday
original_body_lines: Pastor Jerome Fernando who is facing a CID probe following his derogatory remarks against Islam, Buddhism and Hinduism, said on a Instagram post this evening that he will return to Sri Lanka on Sunday.
He said he was presently traveling on pre scheduled official matters pertaining to the ministry.
"As you are all aware, I’m presently traveling on pre scheduled official matters pertaining to the ministry and will be back home on Sunday.
Looking forward to Sri Lanka," he said on the Instagram post.
Meanwhile flyers released on social media have revealed that he has organized a 'meet and greet' with his followers in Malaysia on May 19 and another one in Singapore on May 21.
